```{r}
## Example 
chipotle <- function(x) {
  weekday <- str_extract_all(x, "[:alpha:]+") %>% unlist()
  customers <- str_extract_all(x, "\\d+") %>% unlist() %>% as.numeric()
  tibble(weekday, customers) %>% arrange(desc(customers))
}
```
